00014 #include "b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase.h"

00016 b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase::b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase(cl_context context, cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue queue) : 
00017         m_plbvh(context, device, queue),
00018         
00019         m_overlappingPairsGpu(context, queue),
00020         
00021         m_aabbsGpu(context, queue),
00022         m_smallAabbsMappingGpu(context, queue),
00023         m_largeAabbsMappingGpu(context, queue)
00024 {
00025 }
00026 
00027 void b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase::createProxy(const b3Vector3& aabbMin, const b3Vector3& aabbMax, int userPtr,  int collisionFilterGroup,  int collisionFilterMask)
00028 {
00029         int newAabbIndex = m_aabbsCpu.size();
00030 
00031         b3SapAabb aabb;
00032         aabb.m_minVec = aabbMin;
00033         aabb.m_maxVec = aabbMax;
00034         
00035         aabb.m_minIndices[3] = userPtr;
00036         aabb.m_signedMaxIndices[3] = newAabbIndex;
00037         
00038         m_smallAabbsMappingCpu.push_back(newAabbIndex);
00039         
00040         m_aabbsCpu.push_back(aabb);
00041 }
00042 void b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase::createLargeProxy(const b3Vector3& aabbMin, const b3Vector3& aabbMax, int userPtr,  int collisionFilterGroup,  int collisionFilterMask)
00043 {
00044         int newAabbIndex = m_aabbsCpu.size();
00045 
00046         b3SapAabb aabb;
00047         aabb.m_minVec = aabbMin;
00048         aabb.m_maxVec = aabbMax;
00049         
00050         aabb.m_minIndices[3] = userPtr;
00051         aabb.m_signedMaxIndices[3] = newAabbIndex;
00052         
00053         m_largeAabbsMappingCpu.push_back(newAabbIndex);
00054         
00055         m_aabbsCpu.push_back(aabb);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase::calculateOverlappingPairs(int maxPairs)
00059 {
00060         //Reconstruct BVH
00061         m_plbvh.build(m_aabbsGpu, m_smallAabbsMappingGpu, m_largeAabbsMappingGpu);
00062         
00063         //
00064         m_overlappingPairsGpu.resize(maxPairs);
00065         m_plbvh.calculateOverlappingPairs(m_overlappingPairsGpu);
00066 }
00067 void b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase::calculateOverlappingPairsHost(int maxPairs)
00068 {
00069         b3Assert(0);    //CPU version not implemented
00070 }
00071 
00072 void b3GpuParallelLinearBvhBroadphase::writeAabbsToGpu() 
00073 { 
00074         m_aabbsGpu.copyFromHost(m_aabbsCpu); 
00075         m_smallAabbsMappingGpu.copyFromHost(m_smallAabbsMappingCpu);
00076         m_largeAabbsMappingGpu.copyFromHost(m_largeAabbsMappingCpu);
00077 }
